name: Super Obliteration (Mac & PC)
description:
It's a little bit Asteroids, and a little bit Turrican, with a whole lot of Pang, and even more fun and addictiveness, one of my most favourite games from back in the Commodore Amiga age, this is Super Obliteration.

Get your rocks off to this explosive game of destruction and survival as you battle your way through set of increasingly difficult levels with only your wits and your reactions saving you from certain death.

Chunky pixilated goodness is blended with plasma style effects and glowy neon sexiness.

There are several control options, including keyboard and mouse, and dual analogue joystick. Play it however is most comfortable for you, but play it long and hard.

There is also an online high-score board. See if you can get further and score higher than your peers.

There is no DRM of any kind - show your friends and copy for free but if they like the game please point them here to help pay for my coffee addiction, thank you.
